Classes/Order.html#/c:@M@ButtonMerchant@.name: init(id:amount:currencyCode:)
Classes/Order.html#/c:@M@ButtonMerchant@.abstract: Initializes an order object with the passed parameters.

Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/c:@M@Button.name: attributionToken
Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/c:@M@Button.abstract: The last tracked attributionToken from an inbound Button attributed URL.

Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/c:@M@Button.name: trackIncomingURL(_:)
Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/c:@M@Button.abstract: Checks the passed URL for a Button attribution and if present stores the token.

Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/c:@M@Button.name: trackIncomingUserActivity(_:)
Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/c:@M@Button.abstract: Checks the URL in the passed NSUserActivity for a Button attribution and if present stores the token.

Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/c:@M@Button.name: handlePostInstallURL(_:)
Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/c:@M@Button.abstract: Checks to see if the user visited a url prior to installing your app.

Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/c:@M@Button.name: clearAllData()
Classes/ButtonMerchant.html#/c:@M@Button.abstract: Discards the current session and all persisted data.

Classes/ButtonMerchant.html.name: ButtonMerchant
Classes/ButtonMerchant.html.abstract: ButtonMerchant is the main entry point to the library.

Classes/Order.html.name: Order
Classes/Order.html.abstract: Represents an order placed by the user to be tracked using ButtonMerchant.trackOrder(order).
